presentation.title: Welcome to my portfolio
presentation.subtitle: I am Marion Robert and I am a Full-stack Web Developer.

paragraphs.1: With a background in law, I spent three rewarding years supporting asylum seekers in the community sector. Driven by a desire for new things and daily challenges, I retrained in IT.
paragraphs.2: I discovered programming by learning the Python language, then I followed two training courses in web development with Le Wagon and the 3w Academy.
paragraphs.3: Over the last two years, my various apprenticeships, projects and experiences have allowed me to put my knowledge into practice and strengthen my interest in IT.

projects.title: Harmony
projects.name: harmony
projects.description: Harmony helps refugees integrate by facilitating local interactions. The app allows users to offer or book activities to exchange services and earn points for future help.
projects.features: User sessions; Activity filtering; Content moderation by admin; Email notifications
projects.technologies: JS / NodeJS / Express.js; React; SQL / MySQL; Redux; Axios; bcrypt; GoogleAPI / nodemailer

projects.title: Verdure
projects.name: verdure
projects.description: Verdure is a web application dedicated to selling indoor plants.
projects.features: User sessions; Shopping cart; Payment via Stripe; Dashboards for tracking orders by users and admins
projects.technologies: JavaScript; NodeJS / Express.js; React; SQL / MySQL; Redux; Axios; bcrypt; Stripe

projects.title: Wall Art Works
projects.name: waw
projects.description: Wall Art Works is an online store specializing in AI-generated artworks.
projects.features: Login via Google & Facebook; Product search by keywords; Environment preview; Cart management and payment via Stripe
projects.technologies: Ruby; Rails; PostgreSQL; Devise; Pagy; Omniauth; Pg_search; Rails_admin; Ransack

projects.title: Synopsix
projects.name: synopsix
projects.description: Synopsix is a game where players have to guess the title of a movie based on its synopsis.
projects.features: Display of words according to proximity score; Hint visualization; Player rankings; Choice of game mode and movie category
projects.technologies: Ruby; Rails; PostgreSQL; Devise; Cloudinary; Bootstrap

projects.title: GuitarPick
projects.name: guitarpick
projects.description: GuitarPick is a guitar rental website inspired by the Airbnb model.
projects.features: User session management; Geolocation; Product search by keywords; User dashboard; Cloud image hosting
projects.technologies: Ruby; Rails; PostgreSQL; Devise; Cloudinary; Bootstrap
